title: Kyojin no Hoshi: Tokubetsu-hen - Hanagata Mitsuru

alternative_titles.ja: 巨人の星【特別篇】猛虎 花形満

synopsis:
Mitsuru Hanagata spent his early childhood in the UK, where he developed a noble spirit by fighting back against the bullying faced by Asian people. After returning to Japan, he becomes the leader of a baseball team of juvenile delinquents and meets his eternal rival, Hyuuma Hoshi. After going to Koshien, the two rivals join Tigers and Giants respectively as professional players. They face-off against each other as they continue to improve their skills, Hyuuma as a pitcher who throws "Big League" balls and Hanagata as an aggressive player.

(Source: TMS)
